name: Manicotti
author: Sara Hooper
instructions: Drain manicotti and place on foil in single layer. Mix next six ingredients together. Stuff pasta. Melt butter; add tomato sauce and garlic powder. Pour some sauce on bottom of baking dish. Add manicotti in single layer. Spoon remaining sauce over top. Sprinkle 1 cup Mozzarella cheese over sauce. Cover. Bake at 350Â° for 45 min- utes. Uncover during the last 15 minutes.
